comments.body: If you want to import the type from the test, you can move them into the namespace

When I try to export OutputFiles within the namespace, I get the following linting error:

```
ERROR: 21:2  strict-export-declare-modifiers  'export' keyword is redundant here because all declarations in this module are exported automatically. If you have a good reason to export some declarations and not others, add 'export {}' to the module to shut off automatic exporting. See: https://github.com/Microsoft/dtslint/blob/master/docs/strict-export-declare-modifiers.md
```
